articles.title: Second Plenum of Seventh WPK Central Committee
articles.content:
Second Plenum of Seventh WPK Central Committee
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Second Plenum of the 7th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea took place in the capital city of Pyongyang on Oct. 7, Juche 106 (2017).
					 Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), guided the meeting.
					
					 Attending the meeting were members and alternate members of the WPK Central Committee and members of the Central Auditing Commission of the WPK.
					
					 Present as observers were leading officials of the WPK Central Committee and ministries, national institutions and provinces, cities and counties and officials of major industrial establishments.
					
					 The plenary meeting dealt with the following agenda items:
					
					 1. On some immediate tasks to cope with the prevailing situation
					
					 2. Organizational matter
					
					 The first agenda was discussed.
					
					 Chairman Kim Jong Un made a report on the first agenda.
					
					 In his report he made an analysis of the complicated international situation prevailing around the DPRK and the important matters arising therefrom and mentioned the orientation of our Party's immediate activities and economic development to cope with the prevailing situation and set forth the strategic tasks and ways for its materialization.
					
					 He referred to the fact that the U.S. imperialists are making last-ditch efforts to completely stifle the sovereignty and the rights to existence and development of the DPRK by cooking up UNSC "sanctions resolutions" one after another with mobilization of their vassal forces.
					
					 He solemnly declared: The nuclear weapons of the DPRK are a precious fruition borne by its people's bloody struggle for defending the destiny and sovereignty of the country from the protracted nuclear threats of the U.S. imperialists. And they are powerful deterrent firmly safeguarding the peace and security in the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia and reliably guaranteeing the Korean nation's sovereignty and rights to existence and development and a treasured sword of justice to remove the nuclear clouds of tyranny bringing a horrible disaster to mankind and make it possible for the people to lead an independent and happy life under the clear and blue sky.
					
					 He noted with appreciation that the country's science and technology have developed by leaps and bounds and the national economy has grown on their strength this year, despite the escalating sanctions of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces.
					
					 This year's struggle for implementing the decision of the Seventh WPK Congress gave valuable experience that we can readily blaze our path as long as there are perfect independent economic structure of the country and its solid foundations no matter what sanctions the enemies may impose, he said.
					
					 The Chairman affirmed that the prevailing situation and the reality shows that our Party was absolutely right when it dynamically advanced along the socialist road of Juche, holding fast to the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force and that our Party should invariably keep to this road in the future, too.
					
					 Clarifying the Party's principled stand and revolutionary strategy to put an end to the U.S. imperialists' nuclear blackmail and threat and pave a broad avenue to the building of a socialist economic power by further enhancing the might of the self-supporting national economy, he stressed the need to further strengthen the power of the country under the unfurled banner of independence and self-reliance and thus decisively frustrate the reckless nuclear war provocation and sinister sanctions and pressure of the enemies.
					
					 Stating that the WPK will victoriously conclude the standoff with the U.S., which has lasted century after century, and bring earlier the victory in the socialist cause by giving full play to its correct leadership ability, the Chairman set forth the orientation and tasks for bringing the revolutionary struggle to a new great upsurge.
					
					 He emphasized the need to further cement the might of single-minded unity between the Party and the masses.
					
					 The single-minded unity is the cornerstone for existence of our Party and State and the most powerful weapon of the Korean revolution, he said, adding that it is important to direct and submit all activities of the Party and the State to strengthening the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks and steadily make the revolutionary climate of devotedly serving the people prevail throughout the Party.
					
					 He stressed the need to continue thoroughly implementing the Party's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts so as to successfully accomplish the great historic cause of building the state nuclear force.
					
					 He also called for effecting fresh upswing in the building of a socialist economic power with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force and by dint of science and technology.
					
					 The main key to foiling the extremely vicious sanctions and pressure of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces and turning misfortune into a blessing is just self-reliance and the sci-tech strength, he said, underscoring the need to strengthen the independence and Juche character of the national economy in every way.
					
					 Saying that unyielding efforts should be made to develop the country's economy into an independent economy relying on its own efforts, technology and resources under the line of making the national economy Juche-based and the slogan of self-reliance and thus the process of overcoming today's difficulty should be made an opportunity to bring a decisive turn in building a self-supporting economic power, he mentioned detailed tasks facing the economic sections.
					
					  Noting that science and technology are an engine steering the building of a powerful socialist country, he stressed the need for all sectors and units to thoroughly implement the Party's economic policy by giving definite priority to science and technology and enlisting the energy and wisdom of their sci-tech forces and producers.
					
					 He said that the Cabinet and all the economic guidance organs should conduct well operations and command to strictly implement the revolutionary responding strategy.
					
					 He set it as an important way to enhance the militant function and role of the Party organizations at all levels in every way in order to realize the Party's revolutionary line and strategy.
					
					 The whole Party should pay efforts to strengthening the primary party committees and party cells and thus make all the basic party organizations move in a militant and viable manner at all times under the unified leadership of the Party Central Committee and wage a dynamic drive to carry out the Party's line and policies, he said.
					
					 The present situation is stern and we are faced with ordeals but our Party always remains confident and will firmly adhere to the independent line and open the ever-victorious road despite any upheaval as it enjoys absolute support and trust from the entire army and all the people, he stressed.
					
					 Our cause is invincible as long as there are the solid self-supporting economic foundation laid by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, a large contingent of scientists trained by our Party, the army and people armed with the revolutionary spirit of our Party and the tradition of self-reliance, he said, calling for dynamically struggling for the final victory of the revolution, more closely united around the Party Central Committee.
					
					 A decision on the first agenda was adopted at the plenary meeting.
					
					 Discussed there was an organizational matter, the second agenda.
					
					 Recall and by-election of members and alternate members of the Political Bureau of the Party Central Committee were held.
					
					 Pak Kwang Ho, Pak Thae Song, Thae Jong Su, An Jong Su and Ri Yong Ho were elected members of the Political Bureau of the Party Central Committee to fill the vacancy.
					
					 Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Dok, Kim Yo Jong and Jong Kyong Thaek were elected alternate members of the Political Bureau of the Party Central Committee to fill the vacancy.
					
					 Vice-Chairmen of the Party Central Committee were relieved of their posts and elected.
					
					 Pak Kwang Ho, Pak Thae Song, Thae Jong Su, Pak Thae Dok, An Jong Su and Choe Hwi were elected vice-chairmen of the Party Central Committee,
					
					 Recall and by-election of members of the Party Central Military Commission were held.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Pyong Chol, Jong Kyong Thaek and Jang Kil Song were elected members of the Party Central Military Commission to fill the vacancy.
					
					 Recall and by-election of members and alternate members of the Party Central Committee were held.
					
					 Kim Pyong Ho, Kim Myong Sik, Kim Jong Sik and Choe Tu Yong were elected members of the Party Central Committee from alternate members to fill the vacancy and Ri Ju O, Jon Kwang Ho, Ko In Ho, Choe Tong Myong, Ryang Won Ho, Kim Kwang Hyok, Hong Yong Chil, Kim Myong Gil, Kim Tu Il, Ryang Jong Hun, Ri Hi Yong and Ho Chol Ryong were elected members of the Party Central Committee to fill the vacancy.
					
					 Sing Ryong Man, Yu Jin, Sin Yong Chol, Jang Kil Song, Ju Song Nam, Rim Kwang Ung, Jang Ryong Sik, Kim Yong Ho, Hyon Song Wol, Ma Won Chun, Ryom Chol Su, Song Chun Sop, Jang Jun Sang, Kim Yong Jae, Kim Chun Do, Kim Chang Gwang, Kim Yong Gyu, Jo Jun Mo, Sin Yong Chol, Kim Chang Yop, Jang Chun Sil, Pak Chol Min, Pak Mun Ho, Choe Sung Ryong, Choe Rak Hyon, Ho Pong Il, Kim Kwang Yong and Son Thae Chol were elected alternate members of the Party Central Committee to fill the vacancy.
					
					 Directors of some departments of the Party Central Committee and the editor-in-chief of the Rodong Sinmun were appointed.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Kwang Ho, Thae Jong Su, Kim Yong Su, Ryang Won Ho, Ju Yong Sik and Sin Ryong Man were appointed as department directors of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 Kim Pyong Ho was appointed as editor-in-chief of the Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 Chairman of the Inspection Commission of the Party Central Committee was relieved of his post and elected.
					
					 Jo Yon Jun was elected chairman of the Inspection Commission of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 Chairmen of the provincial committees of the WPK were appointed.
					
					 Kim Tu Il was appointed as chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee, Ryang Jong Hun as chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee and Ri Hi Yong as chairman of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee.
					
					 The 2nd Plenary Meeting of the 7th Central Committee of the WPK held under the guidance of Chairman Kim Jong Un will mark an epochal occasion in hastening the final victory in the building of a socialist power and the revolutionary cause of Juche by dynamically arousing the whole Party, the entire army and all the people to the general offensive to implement the decision of the Party Seventh Congress under the unfurled banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Participants in 2nd Plenum of 7th WPK Central Committee Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Participants in 2nd Plenum of 7th WPK Central Committee Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Second Plenum of the 7th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Saturday.
					 Among them was respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Together with the Supreme Leader, the members of the party central leadership organ laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the palace. And they paid tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 Then, they made deep bows to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the halls where they lie in state.

articles.title: Congratulations to Mongolian PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Mongolian PM
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet, on Oct. 6 sent a congratulatory message to U. Khurelsukh upon his appointment as prime minister of Mongolia.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations with a long history and tradition between the two countries would steadily develop in conformity with their common interests and wished him success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Japan, S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Their Crimes against Humanity: DPRK Representative to UN
articles.content:
Japan, S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Their Crimes against Humanity: DPRK Representative to UN
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The permanent representative of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to the United Nations made a speech at the Third Committee, 72nd Session of UN General Assembly on agenda "Advancement of Women" on Oct. 6.
					 He said:
					
					 The women, who are a half of the global population, assume a great role in promoting well-being and development of families and society and achieving the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals.
					
					 The DPRK government has continued to take legal and practical measures for women to enjoy gender equality and fully exercise their rights in all sectors of state and social life.
					
					 The DPRK attaches importance to the dialogue and cooperation for protecting and promoting the human rights, the rights of women in particular, and does its best for their realization.
					
					 The DPRK government will as ever strive for realization of gender equality, advocacy of women's rights, advancement and well-being of women and further strengthen the international cooperation and exchange in this area.
					
					 On the crimes committed by Japan and the south Korean regime against women, the representative said:
					
					 As well known to the world, the sexual slavery is a brutal crime against humanity and flagrant violation of human rights committed by Japan during World War II. Japan forced 200 000 Korean women and girls and many other women from Asian and other countries into sexual slaves for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 72 years elapsed since its defeat in World War II, but Japan has denied its crime to date, let alone make an apology, and busied itself covering up the crime.
					
					 Japan must admit, as requested by the international community, its state and legal responsibility for the past crimes against humanity and make an official and sincere apology and compensation.
					
					 The United Nations should never tolerate the criminal acts of Japan which insults the sexual slavery victims by terming them as "prostitutes" although it had committed the hideous crime against hundreds of thousands of women and should put pressure on Japan until it makes an official apology and compensation.
					
					 The south Korean regime did a group abduction of 12 DPRK women citizens abroad in daylight early April 2016 by gangsters of its intelligence service.
					
					 But, the south Korean authorities have not yet inform the international community and victims' parents of their fate.
					
					 I want to remind you that the DPRK government and victims' parents have already requested the secretary-general of the UN, the UN high commissioner for Human Rights and UN Human Rights Council several times to set the crime as an official agenda of the UN and hold the criminals accountable in the international court. But regrettably, there has been no positive answer from them.
					
					 Recently the DPRK government made an official proposal to the UN high commissioner for Human Rights to visit the north and the south of Korea respectively to solve the abduction issue and to take relevant measures for reunion of the victims with their families at the earliest date by meeting the victims and their families in person.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly wish the national reconciliation, unity and reunification, they have to apologize immediately and return the abducted DPRK women citizens to the embrace of their parents without delay.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from GS of Lao People's Revolutionary Party
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from GS of Lao People's Revolutionary Party
 Pyongyang, October 8 -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Bounnhang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, Sunday.
					 The general secretary in the message extended warm congratulations and best wishes, on behalf of the LPRP Central Committee, all the party members and people and on his own behalf, to Kim Jong Un and all officials of the WPK Central Committee, all party members and the fraternal Korean people on the 72nd birthday of the WPK.
					
					 Under the courageous guidance of the WPK, the fraternal Korean people have registered great achievements in defending the country and in all fields of building a powerful country for the past 72 years, the message said.
					
					 It hoped that the WPK would bring substantial benefits to the Korean people by implementing the decision of its 7th Congress and make successes in building a powerful socialist country and realizing the peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 Wishing Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and success in carrying out his noble cause, the message said:
					
					 We hope that the long-standing relations of friendship between the two parties, two states and the two peoples of the Lao People's Democratic Republic and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea would continue to strengthen in keeping with the development of relations for peace, friendship and cooperation in the region and the world.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here, the military attaches corps, a delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand and other foreigners visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday, the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders in the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 Then they went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house the cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 Meanwhile, Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su visited the Palace to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 20th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as G.S. of WPK
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 20th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as G.S. of WPK
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at Kim Il Sung Square here on Sunday to celebrate the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Attending it were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK; Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK; Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet; Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau; and other senior party, state and army officials.
					
					 Also present were members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang, officials of the party and armed forces organs and ministries, national institutions, officers and men of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and officials of institutions and industrial establishments, labor innovators, working people, youths and students in the city and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae in his report at the meeting said that October 8 is a day of invariable loyalty and pledge on which the yearnings of all the servicepersons and people for the great leader who led the WPK in the van are fully displayed and their faith and will to keep to the path along the party are hardened.
					
					 The reporter extended the humblest reverence and eternal glory to leader Kim Jong Il who developed the WPK into the organizer and guide of our people for all victories and opened up a new history of prosperity on this land.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il is the symbol of mightiness and the eternal leader of the invincible WPK.
					
					 During his guidance over the WPK, he perfectly solved all the theoretical and practical matters arising in the building of a revolutionary party and accomplishing the revolutionary cause in the era of independence and attained rich experience and exploits for the building of a socialist ruling party.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of our Party as Kimilsungism, set forth the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism and comprehensively systemized the idea and theory of Juche for building the party, state and armed forces and all the fields of economic and cultural construction.
					
					 With deep insight into the lawful requirement of the continued revolutionary cause and the historical lesson of the building of the socialist ruling party, he regarded the succession to the idea and leadership of the party as the most important matter decisive of the future destiny of the country and the nation and provided a strong organizational and ideological foundation and leadership system for it.
					
					 Attaching priority to the strengthening of the army in the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of the party, he set it as the general task for army-building to model the whole army on Kimilsungism and trained the People's Army into the pure army of the leader and the party and matchless revolutionary army upholding the party's idea and cause in the van.
					
					 He steadily enhanced the leadership role of the party to make the immortal feats to go down in the national history for opening the heyday of building a socialist power.
					
					 He wisely led the nationwide struggle for reunification of the country and provided the June 15 era of reunification advancing in the idea of By Our Nation Itself and enhanced the international prestige of our Party and State and made great contributions to the cause of independence and socialism against imperialism through his energetic external activities.
					
					 The reporter stressed that invincible is the cause of the WPK which is dashing ahead toward the victory of socialism under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as its eternal leader.
					
					 Meanwhile, similar celebrations took place in all provinces, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Evening Gala of Working People, Youth and Students of Pyongyang Held
articles.content:
Evening Gala of Working People, Youth and Students of Pyongyang Held
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- "We Will Hold Our General in High Esteem Forever", the evening gala of working people, youth and students of Pyongyang, took place at Kim Il Sung Square on Sunday, the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK; Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee; Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet; Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA; and other senior party and state officials, officials of party, armed forces, power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial enterprises in the city and people of meritorious service. 
					
					 Invited there were overseas Koreans, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations, members of the military attaches corps here and their spouses and foreign guests.
					
					 Working people in various circles and students and youths danced to the tunes of songs "Greeting the Sun Rising over the Taedong River", the immortal masterpiece, and "Our General Is the Best".
					
					 Song "Party Is Care of the General" and "Fortune of Korea" resounded forth and then cheerful circle dances were presented.
					
					 The performers who took the stage sang of the flower garden of socialism blooming day by day in songs "People's Country" and "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass".
					
					 Numbers included decorative tassels, rhythmic gymnastics and acrobatic pieces.
					
					 Youngsters presented the beautiful sea of dancers full of boundless pride and self-confidence leading a worthwhile life, being blessed with the illustrious leaders and the party generation after generation.

articles.title: Fireworks Displayed across Country
articles.content:
Fireworks Displayed across Country
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed in the capital city of Pyongyang and provinces of the DPRK in celebration of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Banks of the River Taedong centering around Kim Il Sung Square and the Tower of the Juche Idea in Pyongyang were crowded with people from all walks of life and school youth and children on Sunday evening to see the fireworks.
					
					Fireworks went off in the sky above Pyongyang amid the playing of songs "General Kim Jong Il, Peerless Patriot" and "Might of Korea". 
					
					Spectacular fireworks-display was an expression of eternal glory to leader Kim Jong Il and an eruption of the Korean people's ardent loyalty to him.
					
					On the same day, fireworks were displayed in Phyongsong, Sinuiju and other provincial seats, too.

articles.title: Floral Tributes Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tributes Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the 20th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Seen before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Placed at the statues were floral baskets, together with bouquets and flowers, in the names of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, industrial establishments and schools in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 Floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were also laid before the statues of the great leaders in different parts of the city including Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Servicepersons and civilians across the country visited the statues of the great leaders and mosaics depicting their smiling images in their residential areas to pay homage to them.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as General Secretary of WPK Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as General Secretary of WPK Celebrated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK celebrated with splendor the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 People from all walks of life visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the supreme temple of Juche, with pure loyalty and yearning for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to pay tribute to them before their smiling portraits.
					
					 Service personnel, people and school youth and children paid homage to the statues of the great leaders and portraits depicting their smiling images on Mansu Hill and in different parts of the country.
					
					 Working people visited the photo exhibitions in Pyongyang and each province, looking back upon the history of revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il and the days when they made a revolution under his leadership. 
					
					 Songs praising the great man and the Workers' Party resounded throughout the country.
					
					 Artistes of the South Phyongan Provincial Art Troupe staged a performance at the Provincial House of Culture and sang in high praise of the national pride and self-respect being blessed with the illustrious leaders and the party.
					
					 Artistes of the Jagang Provincial Art Troupe and students of February 16 Kanggye Conservatory showed the will of the people to carry on the dynamic struggle along the road of socialism.
					
					 Those in Ryanggang, Kangwon, South and North Hwanghae provinces gave performances of high ideological value and artistry.

articles.title: Art Performance Goes on in North Phyongan Province of DPRK
articles.content:
Art Performance Goes on in North Phyongan Province of DPRK
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The music and dance performance of the State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe has grasped the hearts of inhabitants in North Phyongan Province from the outset, and the enthusiasm to enjoy the performance is increasing day by day.
					 The audience included workers, technicians and officials of major industrial establishments and working people, youth and students in the province.
					
					 The hall of performance resounded with applause when the artistes appeared on the stage where the letters reading "Warm congratulations to the North Phyongan provincial people building the best socialist paradise!" are displayed on the background.
					
					 When the national anthem was played, the hall was in a mood of joy and excitement.
					
					 The performers well represented the true features of the great mother through such numbers as "Song Dedicated to Mother Party", "Oh Party, It's Thanks to Your Care", "We Sing of the Party" and "You Are Mother" praising the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 As a narrative poem "Oh North Phyongan Province, glorify the socialist paradise" was presented and the images of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il displayed on the background, the audiences could hardly repress their deep yearning for the great leaders.
					
					 A sea of dances in the hall with female and male chorus "Silk Girl in Nyongbyon" and "Changsong Today" revved up the atmosphere of the performance.
					
					 Light music "Pyongyang Is Best" and tap dance "Young Days" were acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 The performance is evoking a lively response among the audiences.
					
					 It will continue.

articles.title: 2017 Inter-Provincial Mass Sports Contest to Be Held
articles.content:
2017 Inter-Provincial Mass Sports Contest to Be Held
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The 2017 inter-provincial mass sports contest will take place in Pyongyang from Oct. 17.
					 The contest will be held at the Kim Il Sung Stadium, Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other stadiums and gymnasiums here. It will bring together working people, housewives, school youth and children and sportspersons selected from Pyongyang and each province (municipality).
					
					 They will compete in the five professional sports events including football and basketball, six popular sports events including volleyball, tennis and Taekwon-Do, and three-event sports and amusement games.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Eternal General Secretary of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Eternal General Secretary of WPK
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Though he passed away, the DPRK people have been proud of upholding him as the eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 Because, he developed the WPK into a revolutionary party in which the ideological and leadership system of the leader is thoroughly established, the motherly party forming a harmonious whole with the popular masses and serving them and the invincible party with strong discipline and combat capability.
					
					 After starting his work at the Central Committee of the WPK, he formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and set out the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism to indicate the guiding idea and action program to be adhered to by the revolutionary party in the era of independence.
					
					 He advanced the line of modeling the whole party on Kimilsungism and energetically led the struggle for its realization and thus brought about a radical turn in its organizational and ideological construction and leadership art. Under his energetic guidance, the WPK turned into an integral whole knitted together in ideological and organizational aspects and action, closely united around the leader.
					
					 He put forward the slogan "We Serve the People!" and made a long journey of ceaseless field guidance for building a thriving country.
					
					 His outstanding political caliber was fully displayed in strengthening the WPK into a guiding force of Songun (military-first) revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Il saw to it that the party and the revolutionary ranks have been developed into elite forces with the Korean People's Army as the core and opened up the unique path for pushing ahead with the revolution and construction by dint of Songun political mode. This is a noteworthy event which has been unprecedented in the history of building socialist ruling party.
					
					 The feats performed by Kim Jong Il in developing the WPK into an ever-victorious revolutionary party has been creditably carried forward by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is the steadfast faith of the DPRK army and people that the eternal mightiness of the WPK and victory in the cause of building a socialist power lie in upholding the leadership of Kim Jong Un under the uplifted banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: WPK Will Always Emerge Victorious and Glorious: Papers
articles.content:
WPK Will Always Emerge Victorious and Glorious: Papers
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Victory and glory are in store for the Workers' Party of Korea with Comrade Kim Jong Il as its eternal leader.
					 Leading newspapers of the DPRK Sunday in editorials stress this on the 20th anniversary of his election as general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 It is a special event of weighty significance in the development of the WPK and the revolution that he was elected as WPK general secretary by the unanimous will and desire of all party members, servicepersons and people on Oct. 8, Juche 86 (1997), Rodong Sinmun says, adding:
					
					 Clearly recorded in the proud course of the WPK which has emerged victorious along its unique road of development, setting the example of the times in building a revolutionary party and also in the praiseworthy road in which it ushered in the great heyday in all fields of the revolution and construction under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism are the distinguished leadership exploits of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Today our Party is opening up the greatest heyday of its development with his ideology and exploits as a cornerstone.
					
					 The WPK is conducting the party building and activities as guided by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, regarding it as its unique guiding ideology and has firm center of the leadership and unity and the whole party shares the same thinking and breath and step with the leader. This is the true picture of the WPK.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the WPK which opens up a new great era of prosperity by relying on the invincible revolutionary leadership and the Juche-based leadership mode reflective of the undying party building exploits of the leader.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all the people to vigorously struggle for the final victory of the revolution, rallied closer around the Party under the uplifted banner of the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Force Can Never Be Taken Issue with: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Force Can Never Be Taken Issue with: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The nuclear force of the DPRK can never be taken issue with by anyone, says Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary.
					 An opinion goes in the international arena that there is no other way but to accept the DPRK into the nuclear club in order to settle the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is the logical result that the international community expresses understanding of the DPRK's measures for bolstering its nuclear force and denounces the "beheading operation" and other annual joint military exercises waged by the U.S. at the doorstep of the DPRK as more dangerous, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the U.S. which compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear force and bolster it.
					
					 The U.S. included the DPRK in the targets of preemptive nuclear attack and has seriously threatened and blackmailed the security and the right to existence of the DPRK and staged joint military drills every year, aggravating the situation on the Korean peninsula in a cyclic manner.
					
					 Now that the U.S., the world's biggest nuclear weapons possessor, is desperately trying to militarily stifle the DPRK, the latter could not but consider the final means for defence of the country and for the maintenance of its existence and opt for the possession of nuclear deterrence for self-defence to ensure military balance with the U.S. and deter a war.
					
					 The DPRK will never abandon the nuclear force which it built at a high cost, the valuable strategic assets on which hinges the destiny of the country and the nation, no matter however hard the riff-raffs may try to take issue with it.
					
					 No matter how many times the world may change, the army and people of the DPRK will further bolster qualitatively and quantitatively the nuclear sword for self-defence, a boon for the eternal prosperity of the country and the happiness of all posterity to come.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces should clearly face up to the situation and drop the foolish ambition of the "north's nuclear dismantlement".

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Desperate to Ignite War against North
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Desperate to Ignite War against North
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military warmongers on Oct. 3 made desperate efforts to ignite a war against the north while trumpeting about the "security crisis", according to reports.
					 The chief of the puppet Naval Staff boarded the U.S.-made sea-patrol plane and went to hotspot waters in the West Sea, crying out for "the region with high possibility of the north's provocation" and "perfect combat posture".
					
					 The chief of the puppet Air Staff went to units in the hotspot waters in the West Sea and urged his stooges "to immediately punish the north if it provokes."

articles.title: S. Korean Youth Organization Denounces War Lunatic Trump
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth Organization Denounces War Lunatic Trump 
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A south Korean youth organization staged a protest against old lunatic Trump before the U.S. embassy in Seoul from September 27 to 29, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 The protesters said that Trump's outbursts for sanctions and pressure on the north and "beheading operation" drill openly staged as part of south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises increase the danger of a war on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is escalating the danger of war while encroaching upon the interests of the south Koreans in order to meet its own interests, they noted.
					
					 Trump is to blame for the danger of war on the Korean peninsula, they said, noting that if a war breaks out on the peninsula, the south Koreans will suffer the greatest pain.

articles.title: Crimes on Increase in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crimes on Increase in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean CBS on Oct. 3 said that the cases of children's murdering their parents are on increase in south Korea where all evils prevail.
					It was reported that such crime stood at 69 out of 1 826 murder cases on an annual average for five years from 2012.
					
					Last year such crime increased nearly three times as against 2012.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Nigerian Body
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Oct. 3 posted on its website the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd founding anniversary.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK. And it indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Bulgarian Body Releases Information Bulletin to Mark WPK's Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Bulgarian Body Releases Information Bulletin to Mark WPK's Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released an information bulletin on the occasion of the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The bulletin in an article titled "72 Years of WPK" said that although the WPK was founded on Oct. 10, 1945, the historical roots of the party had already been provided long ago.
					
					 The article noted that thanks to the energetic leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the Down-with-Imperialism Union was formed on Oct. 17, 1926, and the Korean revolution greeted a new turning point.
					
					 He ended the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and liberated Korea and then founded the WPK, it pointed out.
					
					 Under the leadership of the great Party the Korean people built a new society and carried out the postwar reconstruction and successfully accomplished the historic task of socialist industrialization in a short span of time, it said, and went on:
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics of the WPK, socialism has been firmly defended and the DPRK has access to the tremendous nuclear deterrent despite the moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 All the achievements made by the DPRK are the fruition of the wise guidance of the great leaders President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, it stressed.

articles.title: Informacion sobre la Segunda Reunion Plenaria del VII Periodo del CC del PTC
articles.content:
Informacion sobre la Segunda Reunion Plenaria del VII Periodo del CC del PTC
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el 7 de octubre del 106 (2017) de la Era Juche en Pyongyang, capital de la revolucion, la Segunda Reunion Plenaria del Septimo Periodo del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC).
					Kim Jong Un, Presidente del PTC, dirigio la reunion plenaria.
					
					En esta cita participaron los miembros y los miembros suplentes del CC del PTC.
					
					Tambien, estaban presentes los miembros de la Comision Revisora Central del PTC.
					
					Y tomaron parte como observadores los funcionarios responsables del CC del PTC, los ministerios, los organos centrales, las provincias (ciudades) y distritos, y los cuadros de las fabricas y empresas importantes.
					
					En el pleno fueron propuestas las siguientes agendas.
					
					1. Sobre unas tareas inmediatas frente a la situacion creada.
					
					2. El problema de organizacion.
					
					En la reunion plenaria fue discutida la primera agenda.
					
					Kim Jong Un, Presidente del PTC, hizo informe sobre la primera agenda.
					
					En su informe el Presidente analizo y evaluo la compleja situacion internacional en torno a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los importantes problemas presentados y presento la direccion de las actividades inmediatas de nuestro partido y del desarrollo economico, las tareas y los medios estrategicos por su practica.
					
					Senalo que en contubernio con sus fuerzas seguidoras los imperialistas norteamericanos hacen desesperados esfuerzos por suprimir completamente nuestros derechos a la soberania, la existencia y el desarrollo inventando una tras otra las "resoluciones de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Aclaro con seriedad que nuestras armas nucleares son el precioso resultado de la lucha ensangrentada de nuestro pueblo para defender el destino y la soberania de la patria desde la amenaza nuclear de los imperialistas yanquis que perdura durante largo tiempo, el poderoso disuasorio que protege firmemente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Nordeste Asiatico y el justo remedio omnipotente que elimina el nubarron del despotismo tendente a acarrear el severo catastrofe a la humanidad y permite a los pueblos disfrutar de una vida independiente y feliz bajo el cielo claro y azul.
					
					El Presidente del PTC evaluo que aun en medio de las crecientes sanciones de los imperialistas yanquis y sus satelites, este ano se han desarrollado vertiginosamente las ciencias y tecnicas del pais y, basandose en su poderio, se ha crecido la economia nacional.
					
					Mediante la lucha de este ano para la materializacion de la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC, hemos adquirido las preciosas experiencias de que podemos forjar el futuro superando cualesquier sanciones de los enemigos, mientras que esta perfeccionada de manera independiente la estructura economica del pais y hay su solida base, agrego.
					
					La situacion creada y la realidad de hoy demostraron que fue muy justo el que nuestro Partido ha venido avanzando con pasos firmes por la unica senda del socialismo del Juche tomando firmemente la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares y que en el futuro tambien debemos seguir ese camino invariable, afirmo.
					
					Aclaro la posicion de principios y la estrategia de reaccion revolucionaria de nuestro partido para poner fin al chantaje y amenaza nucleares de los imperialistas norteamericanos, consolidar mas el poderio de la economia nacional y abrir el ancho camino hacia la construccion de la potencia economica socialista, y destaco la necesidad de fortalecer aun mas nuestra fuerza bajo la bandera de independencia, la de autoconfianza, y frustrar rotundamente las imprudentes maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear de los enemigos y sus viles campanas de sancion y aplastamiento.
					
					Afirmo que al desplegar su correcto liderazgo, nuestro partido pondra punto final a la confrontacion antiyanqui realizada de siglo a siglo y adelantara la victoria final de la causa socialista y presento el rumbo de lucha y las tareas para llevar la revolucion a nuevo auge.
					
					Acentuo la necesidad de consolidar mas el poderio de la unidad monolitica entre el partido y las masas populares.
					
					Asevero que la unidad monolitica es el cimiento de la existencia de nuestro Partido y el Estado y el arma mas potente de nuestra revolucion y senalo la necesidad de orientar y sujetar de punto a cabo todas las actividades del Partido y el Estado a consolidar la unidad monolitica de la fila revolucionaria y de establecer mas estrictamente el modo partidista revolucionario de servir fielmente para el pueblo.
					
					Refirio a la necesidad de llevar a feliz termino la gran causa historica de la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado al seguir materializando cabalmente la orientacion de desarrollo paralelo del partido.
					
					Hizo hincapie en producir nuevo auge en la construccion de la potencia economica socialista basandose en la gran fuerza motriz del autofortalecimiento y en el poderio de las ciencias y tecnicas.
					
					La clave principal para frustrar las peores maniobras de sancion y aplastamiento de los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus fuerzas seguidoras y convertir lo desfavorable en lo favorable esta precisamente en la autoconfianza y la fuerza de las ciencias y tecnicas, dijo y destaco la necesidad de intensificar por todos los medios el caracter independiente y jucheano de la economia nacional.
					
					Tomando mas firmemente la linea de la jucheanizacion de la economia nacional y la consigna de autoconfianza hay que desarrollar con teson la lucha por hacer de la economia del pais la independiente que se apoya en nuestras fuerzas, tecnicas y recursos para que el proceso de superar las severas dificultades de hoy se sirviera del motivo para traer el viraje decisivo en la construccion de la potencia economica independiente, subrayo e ilumino detalladamente las tareas para las ramas de la economia nacional por su practica.
					
					 Las ciencias y tecnicas devienen la locomotora de la construccion de la potencia socialista, dijo y asevero que todos los dominios y todas las unidades deben materializar cabalmente la politica economica del partido anteponiendolas con firmeza y movilizando sus propias fuerzas cientificas y tecnicas y la fuerza e inteligencia de las masas productoras.
					
					El Consejo de Ministros y todos los organismos directivos de la economia deben hacer bien la operacion y el mando para materializar estrictamente la estrategia de reaccion revolucionaria, subrayo.
					
					A fin de realizar la linea y estrategia revolucionarias del partido el Presidente presento como medio importante el trabajo de fortalecer por todos los medios la funcion y el papel combativos de las organizaciones partidistas de todos los niveles.
					
					Aseguro que todo el partido debe prestar toda la atencion al fortalecimiento de los comites de la organizacion primaria y las celulas del partido para que todas las organizaciones partidistas de base se movieran siempre de manera combativa y dinamica bajo la unica direccion del CC del Partido y se esforzaran activamente por la materializacion de las lineas y orientaciones del partido.
					
					Aunque la situacion de hoy es muy severa y estamos enfrentados con pruebas, nuestro partido que goza del absoluto apoyo y confianza de todo el ejercito y pueblo esta siempre invencible y abrira el camino victorioso manteniendo firmemente la linea independiente en cualquier cambio de circunstancias, enfatizo.
					
					Gracias a contar con la firme base de la economia independiente preparada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la gran fila de cientificos formados por nuestro partido, el ejercito y pueblo armados con el espiritu revolucionarios de nuestro Partido y la tradicion de lucha apoyada en la autoconfianza, es invencible nuestra causa, dijo y llamo a luchar energicamente por la victoria final de la revolucion uniendose mas firmemente en torno al CC del Partido.
					
					En la reunio plenaria fue adoptada la resolucion sobre la primera agenda.
					
					Tambien, discutio el problema de organizacion, segunda agenda.
					
					Realizaron la destitucion y la eleccion suplementaria para los miembros y los suplentes del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido.
					
					Eligieron como miembros del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido a Pak Kwang Ho, Pak Thae Song, Thae Jong Su, An Jong Su y Ri Yong Ho.
					
					Y como miembros suplentes a Choe Hui, Pak Thae Dok, Kim Yo Jong y Jong Kyong Thaek.
					
					Destituyo y eligio a los vicepresidentes del CC del PTC.
					
					Eligio a Pak Kwang Ho, Pak Thae Song, Thae Jong Su, Pak Thae Dok, An Jong Su y Choe Hui como vicepresidentes del CC del PTC.
					
					Destituyo y eligio a los miembros vacantes de la Comision Militar Central del PTC.
					
					Fueron electos como miembros vacantes de la CMC del PTC Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Pyong Chol, Jong Kyong Taek y Jang Kil Song.
					
					Destituyo y eligio suplementariamente a los miembros y los suplentes del CC del PTC.
					
					Eligio a miembros suplentes Kim Pyong Ho, Kim Myong Sik, Kim Jong Sik y Choe Tu Yong como miembros del CC del PTC y eligieron suplementariamente como miembros del CC del PTC a Ri Ju O, Jon Kwang Ho, Ko In Ho, Choe Tong Myong, Ryang Won Ho, Kim Kwang Hyok, Hong Yong Chil, Kim Myong Gil, Kim Tu Il, Ryang Jong Hun, Ri Hi Yong y Ho Chol Yong.
					
					Eligio suplementariamente como miembros suplentes del CC del PTC a Sin Ryong Man, Yu Jin, Sin Yong Chol, Jang Kil Song, Ju Song Nam, Rim Kwang Ung, Jang Ryong Sik, Kim Yong Ho, Hyon Song Wol, Ma Won Chun, Ryom Chol Su, Song Chun Sop, Jang Jun Sang, Kim Yong Jae, Kim Chun Do, Kim Chang Gwang, Kim Yong Gyu, Jo Jun Mo, Sin Yong Chol, Kim Chang Yop, Jang Chun Sil, Pak Chol Min, Pak Mun Ho, Choe Sung Ryong, Choe Rak Hyon, Ho Pong Il, Kim Kwang Yong y Son Thae Chol.
					
					Nombro a los unos jefes de departamentos del CC del PTC y al editor jefe de la Editora del Periodico Rodong Sinmun.
					
					Como jefes de departamento del PTC, nombro a Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Kwag Ho, Thae Jong Su, Kim Yong Su, Ryang Won Ho, Ju Yong Sik y Sin Ryong Man.
					
					Nombro a Kim Pyong Ho como editor jefe de la Editora del Periodico Rodong Sinmun.
					
					Destituyo y eligio al presidente de la Comision de Control del CC del PTC.
					
					Jo Yon Jun fue electo como presidente de la Comision de Control del CC del PTC.
					
					Nombro a los presidentes de los comites del PTC en las provincias.
					
					Nombro a Kim Tu Il como presidente del Comite del PTC en la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, a Ryang Jong Hun como presidente del Comite del PTC en la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte y a Ri Hi Yong como presidente del comite del PTC en la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte.
					
					La Segunda Reunion Plenaria del Septimo Periodo del CC del PTC, efectuada bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Jong Un, servira del motivo trascendental en anticipar la victoria final de la construccion de la potencia socialista y la causa revolucionaria del Juche al organizar y movilizar con dinamismo a todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo a la ofensiva general para la materializacion de la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC bajo la bandera del gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.

articles.title: Participantes en el 2o pleno del 7o periodo del CC de PTC rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Participantes en el 2o pleno del 7o periodo del CC de PTC rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los participantes en la segunda reunion plenaria del septimo periodo del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea rindieron homenaje el dia 7 al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un visito el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan junto con ellos.
					
					Los miembros de los organos de direccion central del partido depositaron, junto con el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, un cesto de flores ante las estatuas de pie del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Y rindieron homenaje al Presidente y al Dirigente ante sus estatuas de pie y en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos.

articles.title: Representante de RPDC condena crimenes antieticos de Japon y el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Representante de RPDC condena crimenes antieticos de Japon y el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- El representante coreano pronuncio discurso el dia 6 con el tema "Progreso de la mujer" en la reunion del tercer comite de la 72a sesion plenaria de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					El dijo que las mujeres, que ocupan la mitad de la poblacion, cumplen un gran papel en la promocion del bienestar y el desarrollo de la familia y sociedad y en el alcance de las metas de desarrollo sostenible para 2030, y continuo:
					
					El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea toma una tras otra las medidas de la ejecucion legal para que las mujeres tengan el derecho igual con los hombres y ejerzan con suficiencia sus derechos en todos los sectores de la vida estatal y social.
					
					La RPDC da importancia a los dialogos y las cooperaciones para el fomento de la proteccion de los derechos humanos, sobre todo, los DDHH de la poblacion femenina, y hace todos los posibles para su realizacion.
					
					En el futuro tambien, el gobierno de la RPDC desarrollara mas las cooperaciones e intercambio internacionales para la igualdad de ambos sexos, la proteccion de los derechos de las mujeres, el progreso y el mejoramiento del bienestar de las mujeres.
					
					El representante denuncio los crimenes antieticos cometidos contra las mujeres por Japon y las autoridades surcoreanas y continuo:
					
					Como saben todos, el crimen de esclavitud sexual del viejo ejercito japones deviene el delincuente antietico de categoria especial.
					
					Durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, Japon convirtio a 200 mil mujeres coreanas y las otras de Asia y de muchos paises del mundo en las esclavas sexuales para el ejercito japones y violaron sus derechos humanos.
					
					Aunque pasaron 72 anos desde su derrota, Japon no reconoce hasta la fecha sus crimenes, sino los niega e intenta a encubrirlos.
					
					De acuerdo con la demanda de la sociedad internacional, Japon tiene que reconocer su responsabilidad estatal y legal por sus crimenes antieticos del pasado, y hacer disculpa e indemnizacion merecidas.
					
					La ONU no debe tolerar los crimenes de Japon que insulta como "prostitutas" a aquellas victimas de la esclavitud sexual y darle presion a ese pais isleno para que este pida disculpas oficiales y lo indemnice.
					
					A principios de abril de 2016, las autoridades surcoreanas secuestraron a plena luz del dia a 12 ciudadanas norcoreanas en ultramar y las llevaron al Sur de Corea movilizando a los agentes del Servicio de Inteligencia.
					
					Sin embargo, hasta la fecha las autoridades surcoreanas no dan publicidad ni siquiera la situacion de aquellas a la sociedad internacional y a sus familiares.
					
					Vuelvo a recordar el hecho de que hemos demandado en varias ocasiones al secretario general de la ONU, al alto comisionado de la ONU para los derechos humanos y al Consejo de DDHH de la ONU, que cuestionen la seduccion y secuestro de las autoridades surcoreanas y lleven a los culpables al tribunal internacional.
					
					Pero, es lastima que todavia no haya logrado ningun resultado positivo.
					
					Ultimamente, el gobierno de la RPDC propuso por via oficial al alto comisionado de la ONU para los derechos humanos a visitar al Norte y al Sur de Corea y tomar las medidas convenientes para lograr la reunion de las victimas y sus familiares despues de hablar de cara a cara con ellos.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas desean de veras la reconciliacion, unidad y reunificacion de la nacion, deben pedir disculpas ahora mismo por sus actos criminales y devolver cuanto antes a las ciudadanas norcoreanas al regazo de sus familiares.

articles.title: Acto central por aniversario 20 de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del PTC
articles.content:
Acto central por aniversario 20 de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del PTC
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 con solemnidad en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el acto central por el 20o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del BP del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del CE de la RPDC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del BP del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y otros cuadros del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito.
					
					Tambien participaron los miembros de los organos de direccion central del Partido en esta capital, los funcionarios de las instituciones del Partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, las entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de los organismos, fabricas y empresas de esta capital, los innovadores laborales, los trabajadores, los jovenes y estudiantes y los compatriotas residentes en ultramar.
					
					  El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae.
					
					  Para todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el pueblo, el 8 de octubre es el dia de la invariable fidelidad y juramento en que se manifiesta la anoranza al Dirigente quien condujo a la cabeza al PTC y se redoblan la conviccion y la voluntad de seguir eternamente al Partido, subraya el informante.
					
					Rindio el mas sublime homenaje y eterna gloria al Dirigente quien construyo el PTC como organizador y orientador de todas las victorias del pueblo coreano y abrio nueva historia de la prosperidad en la tierra patria.
					
					  El Dirigente es el simbolo de la potencia del invencible PTC y el eterno lider, destaca y continua:
					
					  En los dias de guia sobre el Partido, el resolvio perfectamente todos los problemas teorico-practicos pendientes en la construccion de la agrupacion politica revolucionaria de la epoca independiente y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria y acumulo las ricas experiencias y hazanas de la construccion del partido gubernamental socialista.
					
					  Tras formular la idea revolucionaria del PTC como el kimilsungismo, presento el programa de la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun esa doctrina y sistematizo globalmente la idea y teoria del Juche sobre todas las ramas de la construccion del Partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas y la economica y cultural.
					
					  Al percatarse de la demanda legitima de la causa revolucionaria que continua de generacion en generacion y las lecciones historicas de la construccion del partido en poder socialista, el Dirigente considero el problema de sucesion de la idea y direccion del Partido como lo mas importante que decide el destino futuro de la patria y la nacion y preparo la firme base organizativa e ideologica y el sistema de direccion.
					
					  Despues de conceder la significacion primordial al fortalecimiento del ejercito en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Partido, el Dirigente presento la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el kimilsungismo como el deber general de la construccion militar y convirtio el EPC en el ejercito del lider y el Partido y las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias invencibles, que apoyan fielmente al frente la idea y la causa del Partido.
					
					  El Dirigente acumulo las hazanas a registrarse en la historia de la nacion mejorando incesantemente el papel directriz del Partido y abriendo la era dorada de la construccion de la potencia socialista.
					
					  Condujo sabiamente la gigantesca lucha por la reunificacion del pais, asi que abrio la epoca de la reunificacion del 15 de Junio que avanza bajo el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					  Igualmente elevo el prestigio exterior de nuestro Partido y Estado mediante las energicas actividades exteriores, de manera que hizo gran aporte al cumplimiento de la causa de independencia antiimperialista y la socialista.
					
					  Es invencible la causa del PTC que avanza con pasos firmes hacia la cima de victoria del socialismo bajo la direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un enalteciendo como eterno lider al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Por otra parte, el mismo dia tuvieron lugar los mismos actos en todas las provincias, ciudades y distritos.
